(*Gives Yan a lil shove* Twasn't me! Hope you have fun Yan!)

Rion:

Rion felt the ground give beneath his feet as he toppled forward and rolled 
across the sand. Rion laughed playfully as he attempted to dodge Diana's 
paws. But when he felt the sand slip from beneath him he knew he didn't 
stand a chance. Well, his instructors had always told him he relied too much 
on his feet:

"Woah!"

Rion sprawled out on the ground, He had sand in his feathers and a piece of 
what seemed to be a cactus lodged under his right wing. And, as always,Diana 
had ended up on top, and he was pinned underneath:

"Lemme up!"

He tried to sound tough, but only succeeded in a kind of pleading whine with 
attitude.
